completed_steps.summary: Classified as multi-part monolith with 8 parts: Frontend SPA, Vercel API, Sebuf Proto API, Desktop Tauri, AIS Relay, Convex, Edge Middleware, Nginx Config
Discovered 43 existing docs (15,694 lines) including 17 OpenAPI specs, 4,044-line DOCUMENTATION.md, README, CONTRIBUTING, etc.
Full tech stack analyzed: TypeScript/Vite6/deck.gl/D3/Tauri2/Rust, 20 npm deps, 6 cargo crates, 35+ external APIs
Exhaustive conditional scan: 46 sebuf RPCs, 11 legacy REST endpoints, 52 UI components (22,883 LOC), 79 services (20,276 LOC), 30+ localStorage keys, 2 IndexedDB DBs
Source tree documented: 409 files, ~107,500 lines, annotated directory structure with code distribution
Dev & ops info extracted: 40+ npm scripts, 12 Makefile targets, Playwright E2E, CI/CD pipelines
Integration architecture: web path, desktop path, WebSocket relay, worker comms, proto codegen, secrets, offline strategy
Architecture document generated with system diagram, frontend arch, API layer, desktop arch, proto pipeline, testing, deployment, security
All supporting docs generated: project-overview, component-inventory, api-contracts, development-guide, integration-architecture, source-tree-analysis
Master index.md generated with navigation to all 43 docs (7 new + 36 pre-existing)

resume_instructions: Resuming from step 2 - existing docs discovery
